messages.subject: American History Links
messages.msgSnippet: Well, while researching that statistic, (which of course I haven t found anywhere!) I found a buttload of really comprehensive American History
messages.messageBody:
Well, while researching that statistic, (which of course I haven't found
anywhere!) I found a buttload of really comprehensive American History
links....There's an entire textbook! *sweet* Can you tell I love History?

Every possible document you could ever want...we're talkin' primary sources,
people! I love all the stuff from Adams, Jefferson, Frankiln, et al.
http://personal.pitnet.net/primarysources/

Online American History Textbook
http://www.digitalhistory.uh.edu/database/hyper_titles.cfm

Everything you could ever want to know about the history of our branches and
offices of government.
http://highschoolhub.org/hub/government.cfm

All about the colonies, and not just Williamsburg....
http://falcon.jmu.edu/%7Eramseyil/colonial.htm

Social studies, history and geography links for the US
http://www.esu5.org/techteacher/subject/history.htm


~Aimee
